column4: i have a mac g3 233 with 160meg ram 4gig hd, was wondering if ubuntu would run ok on this
can't say much to the hardware, try macversion, 4 gig isn't big, maybe try to get rid of unneeded packages
so try with the mac version, just the basic facts macs used to be tougher, and ubu can ran on a 233, too (intel)
